summary: This is an internal email from a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney in the SDNY, containing a link to a C-SPAN video of Attorney General nominee William Barr's confirmation hearing, specifically highlighting an exchange with Senator Ben Sasse regarding Jeffrey Epstein. It suggests internal monitoring of political and legal discourse on the case.

persons.name: William Barr
persons.context: Subject of a confirmation hearing before the Senate; his exchange with Senator Sasse regarding Jeffrey Epstein is highlighted in the linked video.

persons.name: Ben Sasse
persons.context: Questioned Attorney General nominee William Barr about Jeffrey Epstein during the Senate confirmation hearing, as noted in the email.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The case involving Epstein was the topic of an exchange between Senator Sasse and AG nominee Barr during the confirmation hearing.

connections.description: Senator Sasse questioned nominee Barr during his confirmation hearing, specifically on the topic of Jeffrey Epstein.
Barr, as the Attorney General nominee, was questioned about the Epstein case during his Senate confirmation hearing.
Senator Sasse raised questions about the Epstein case during William Barr's confirmation hearing.

events.title: Barr Confirmation Hearing Exchange on Epstein
events.description: During the Senate confirmation hearing for Attorney General nominee William Barr, Senator Ben Sasse questioned Barr about Jeffrey Epstein. The exchange is timestamped in a C-SPAN video.

keyFacts: An internal email from the SDNY U.S. Attorney's Office circulated a link to a specific segment of William Barr's AG confirmation hearing.
The segment highlighted (starting around 5:13:00) features Senator Ben Sasse questioning Barr about Jeffrey Epstein.
This shows the Epstein case was a topic of interest and scrutiny during high-level DOJ confirmation proceedings in early 2019.
